# Default introduction page display (2026-01-30 06:04Z)

_**User**_

http://localhost:3001/getting-started/introduction

---

_**Agent (model claude-4.5-opus-high-thinking, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user is saying that when they open the home page of their docs site (likely at localhost:3001), it shows the Introduction page instead of a proper home/landing page. They want the home page to be different from the introduction page.

Let me first explore the docs structure to understand how it's set up. I need to find where the documentation configuration is and how routing is handled.</details></think>
